cost_optimization.tip_0: Promo code FLIKI25ANNUAL (supposed to give 25% off yearly plans) didn’t work at checkout.
cost_optimization.tip_1: Fliki doesn’t offer a free trial of the Premium plan.
cost_optimization.tip_2: Premium features include 1000+ ultra‑realistic voices, longer exports, no watermark, and advanced video tools.
cost_optimization.tip_4: 25% off discount on Fliki premium plans for a whole year.
